div.p: Climatic and non-climatic predictors of nestling condition in Canada jays. Nestling condition of Canada jays was negatively correlated with the frequency of autumn freezeâ€“thaw events ( a), lay date ( c) and brood size ( d). Nestling condition was positively correlated with mean autumn temperature ( b). The shaded area around each line represents a 95% confidence interval. Each line is taken from the top model as determined through model selection using AICc.
